name: Philip Glass
description:
If this was BuddhistOrNotBuddhist.com, minimalist composer Philip Glass would probably get a high score. He has described himself as Buddhist.

If this was TaoistOrNotTaoist.com, minimalist composer Philip Glass would probably get a high score. He has described himself as Taoist. Wait a minute...

If this was HinduOrNotHindu.com, minimalist composer Philip Glass would probably get a high score. He has described himself as Hindu. This is getting kinda too much...

If this was ToltecOrNotToltec.com, minimalist composer Philip Glass would probably get a high score. He has described himself as Toltec. Huh? Toltec? The pre-Aztec civilization? How?

However, this is JewOrNotJew.com, and minimalist composer Philip Glass does get a high score. But all these religions don't exactly make him a minimalist...
